scripts.deploy:all: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run push
scripts.deploy:kintaiTotalling: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run push:kintaiTotalling
scripts.deploy:kintaiTable: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run push:kintaiTable

scripts.deploy:copyTimeLine: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run push:copyTimeLine
scripts.deploy:env: run(){ npm run setup:env $1 && npm run build && npm run push; }; run
